welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gillitts, South Africa! Prepare to be captivated by the charm of our city, known for its stunning scenery and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that Gillitts has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Virginia Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Virginia Airport is responsible for the handling and storage of all air freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pietermaritzburg Oribi Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pietermaritzburg Oribi Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
